page.title: 14Interesting People
page.content: {INTERESTING PEOPLE} {Mr.Emrys Winterson, }a local councillor,has lived in the Garnlydan area for 26 yrs. For 22 of those years he has been in public office.As a young man his work as a trade unionist involved him in helping those around him;this experience encouraged him to stand as a Labour candidate in the local elections.In 1967-8 he was Chairman of the Ebbw Vale Council and this stood him in good stead when he became Mayor of the Borough of Blaenau Gwent in 1983.He has shown particular interest in the welfare of disabled people and his Mayor's Appeal for Motorised Wheelchairs realised Â£13,500 so that ten wheelchairs could be purchased.
